meanings.definition: The state or quality of being plump.
meanings.sent1: Her plumpnesses were evident in the way she filled out her dress.
meanings.sent2: The baby's cheeks showed a delightful plumpnesses.
meanings.sent3: The cat's plumpnesses made it the envy of the other pets in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The plumpnesses of the ripe peach tempted the hungry squirrel.
meanings.sent5: The plumpnesses of the pillow made it perfect for a cozy nap.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a full, rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The plumpnesses of the clouds made them look like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent2: The pumpkin's plumpnesses made it ideal for carving into a jack-o'-lantern.
meanings.sent3: The plumpnesses of the teddy bear made it extra cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The plumpnesses of the snowman's belly made him look jolly.
meanings.sent5: The plumpnesses of the grapes indicated they were ripe for picking.

meanings.definition: The condition of being pleasantly fat or well-rounded.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's baking always resulted in treats with a delightful plumpnesses.
meanings.sent2: The plumpnesses of the puppy made it irresistibly cute.
meanings.sent3: The plumpnesses of the squirrel's cheeks made it look comical.
meanings.sent4: The plumpnesses of the baby's legs were adorable chubby rolls.
meanings.sent5: The plumpnesses of the robin's belly indicated it had found plenty of worms.
